example.name: transitive
example.text: But President Bush is expected [*-1] to veto the congressional legislation and that-2 , along with the easy approval of the Pennsylvania measure , is likely [*-2] to mute the abortion-rights activists ' claims of momentum and underline the challenges faced [*] by this resurgent movement .
